description: What makes an OluKai sandal truly built to last? They like to think it’s a few things: tradition, craftsmanship, and attention to detail. The Hiapo is constructed with naturally tumbled or marbled full-grain leather using hand-sewn traditional whipstitching, complete with moko tattoo artwork details on the footbed. One of their original sandals (hence, its namesake), Hiapo only gets better with age.
name: Olukai Hiapo - Mens

specs.value: Full-grain leather with naturally tumbled or marbled leather and a soft microﬁber lining
Compression molded EVA midsole wrapped in full-grain leather provides anatomically correct contour for a personalized ﬁt and sustained comfort over time
Full-grain leather wrapped outsole with non-marking rubber traction pods for enhanced grip and ﬂexibility
Moko tattoo artwork footbed, hand-sewn whipstitching with heavyweight thread, embroidered logo and a comfortable hand-sewn leather toe post. Leather Working Group certiﬁed supplier
